settings.title: Add Functional Benefits To Any Drink
settings.text: Unflavored Hydration Drops

settings.title: Optimized for function,
settings.text: In collaboration with our board of medical professionals, we created clean and efficient hydration supplements to restore electrolyte and mineral gaps in the American diet—starting at the cellular level.

settings.title: Meet the Drops
settings.text: Add electrolytes, 87 ionic trace minerals, vitamins and antioxidants to any beverage.
The complete electrolyte and mineral supplement for premium hydration
settings.list_item3: No sugar, sweeteners, flavors or artificial ingredients

settings.text: 3-in-1 immune support with electrolytes, vitamins and zinc.
settings.list_item3: No sugar, sweeteners, flavors or artificial ingredients

settings.text: Clean caffeine and hydration for no jitters energy.
settings.list_item3: No sugar, sweeteners, flavors or artificial ingredients

settings.text: A full routine for all-around health that hydrates, energizes, and fortifies.
settings.list_item3: No sugar, sweeteners, flavors or artificial ingredients

settings.text: Seawater electrolytes, 87 ionic ocean minerals and plant-powered vitamins in their most bioavailable form. Add Buoy to your favorite drinks for transformative benefits.

settings.title: Your planet-friendly, flexible subscription
settings.text: THE CLEAR PEE CLUB

settings.title: Optimized for function,  not flavor
settings.text:
Sugar Free

Stevia & Sweetener Free

No Flavors

Vegan

Non-GMO

3x More Bioavailable Form Factor

settings.title: ✨ Mineral Replenishment
settings.text: Before modern agriculture and commercially bottled water, 75% of our absorbable mineral content came from natural water sources. Buoy works to replenish those minerals that are absent in even the healthiest of diets.

settings.title: 🥦 Nutrient Absorption
settings.text: Even minor deficiencies or inbalances in mineral levels can negatively impact our ability to absorb nutrients. Get the most out of the nutrients you intake by replenishing these fundamental minerals and electrolytes throughout the day.

settings.title: 😌 Gut Health
settings.text: Electrolytes work to support a healthy gut. Buoy’s minerals and biological elements help to balance the microbiome, fortify the gut lining and enhance the gut’s inflammation response.

settings.title: 🫖 Detoxification
settings.text: Your liver requires adequate electrolytes and trace minerals to remove unwanted toxins. Buoy promotes these enzymatic reactions by replenishing mineral deficiencies.

settings.title: 💡 Cognition & Mood
settings.text: In men, low electrolyte and mineral levels promote feelings of anxiety and nervouseness; in women, these imbalances present as sluggishness and brain fog. Replenish adequate amounts of them daily for sharper focus, more motivation and lifted moods.

settings.title: Sip on functional benefits
settings.text_bottom: Buoy’s benefits go beyond peak hydration. Refresh, revitalize and restore with the electrolytes and minerals our bodies need to function optimally day after day.

settings.title: Sugar
settings.subtitle: Found in: Gatorade, Liquid IV, Nuun
settings.text: Not only does sugar cause inflammation and disease, it can also make you more dehydrated. Sugar intake can work against electrolyte function.

settings.title: Stevia
settings.subtitle: FOUND IN: ULTIMA, LMNT, NUUN
settings.text: Stevia was prohibited in consumer products until 1991 in the United States and 2018 in the European Union for its connections to gut inflammation, kidney disease and cancer. Sugar lobbyists paid to regulate it.

settings.title: Dextrose
settings.subtitle: FOUND IN: GATORADE, LIQUID IV, NUUN
settings.text: A simple sugar derived from corn, dextrose consumption causes fluid build up, spikes in blood pressure and excessive thirst.

settings.title: Natural Flavors
settings.subtitle: FOUND IN: LIQUID IV, NUUN
settings.text: The FDA allows any food additive originating in nature to be labeled as a Natural Flavor, meaning sketchy solvents and preservatives like BHA and  propylene glycol are basically perfumes for your mouth. Vanilla and Strawberry originate from compounds in beaver anal and sexual glands.

settings.title: Inefficient Form Factors
settings.subtitle: FOUND IN: SPORTS DRINKS, POWDERS, TABLETS
settings.text: Liquid electrolytes are more bioavailable and faster absorbing than powders and tablets. Often times, electrolytes in powders and tablets get left behind in your cup and glass.

settings.title: Artificial Additives
settings.text: There’s a laundry list of ingredients from dyes, oils, chemical alternatives to electrolytes, blending and bleaching agents and artificial ingredients added in for taste that you can find in natural grocery markets.

settings.title: Invest in You with 35% off
settings.text:
Staying hydrated is one of the first things a healthcare professional recommends for chronic illness management.

Buoy offers a clean, effective, and easy-to-use alternative to the other electrolyte companies out there.

We say no to:
settings.text_bottom: Get Buoy's lifetime discount of 35% off when managing a chronic illness. Applying is easy and takes less than 2 minutes.

settings.title: Get Your Chronic Illness Discount
settings.text: Get an additional 15% off Buoy's already discounted subscription plan if you have a chronic illnesses and you're looking for clean hydration.

settings.title: Donations to Nonprofits
settings.text: We donate a bottle for every bottle sold on our website to a verified 501(c)3 nonprofit supporting chronic illness communities. If you don’t have an illness, you can still support those who do.

settings.title: Chronic Illness Creators
settings.text: For Summer 22, we’re investing only in creators with chronic conditions. These talented creators are often tokenized, unpaid and under-represented and it’s time they got their bag.
All Day Energy
Nutrient Absorption
Healthy Gut Biome
Detoxification
Lifted Moods
Radiant Skin
Clean hydration for whole-body health

settings.suptext: With every bottle purchased, we donate a bottle to a nonprofit supporting people with chronic illnesses that need clean hydration.

settings.title: Seawater Electrolytes
settings.text: Hand harvested, seawater electrolytes from protected marine sea salt in the South of France. Preserved in their naturally-occurring, balanced ratios for deep hydration your cells crave.

settings.title: Deep Ocean Trace Minerals
settings.text: 87 ionically charged trace minerals and biological elements from the deep ocean that revitalize, restore and rebuild at the cellular level.

settings.title: B Vitamins
settings.text: A curated blend of plant-powered B vitamins that support routine electrolyte function and facilitate energy production.

settings.title: Antioxidants
settings.text: Soothe the daily inflammation that depletes electrolyte and mineral levels faster than your body naturally would with plant-powered antioxidants.

settings.title: Ingredients your body can actually absorb
settings.subtext: Harvested | Bioavailable | Fast-Absorbing

settings.title: A hydration profile like no other

settings.title: Daily Hydration
settings.text: You lose electrolytes from basically existing. Even if you’re drinking the recommended half-gallon of water every day, you need electrolytes to make the most of the water you’re intaking.

settings.title: Exercising
settings.text: Losing as little as 2% of key electrolytes and fluids can significantly impair physical and mental performance. When you exercise, you lose 6-10%. Restoring these lost electrolytes can improve performance and even boost it above your baseline.

settings.title: Keto Dieters
settings.text: People starting out on the Keto diet can feel like they have the flu even when they don’t--irritable mornings, dizziness, low energy and insomnia. In ketosis, your body burns fatty acids instead of glucose for energy. Within five days of cutting out the carbs, your insulin levels drop, cueing your kidneys to release sodium from your body. No wonder low glycogen and insulin levels have similar symptoms as dehydration--you’re peeing out all those energy bunny electrolytes. A steady intake of key electrolytes sodium, potassium and magnesium help fight the Keto Flu.

settings.title: Vegan Diet
settings.text: Buoy is made of only electrolytes and minerals sourced from the deep ocean and plant-powered vitamins and antioxidants.

settings.title: Hangovers and Alcohol
settings.text: When you drink, your body breaks the alcohol you ingest down into an exponentially more potent byproduct called acetaldehyde. Although hangovers can’t totally be avoided, replacing the electrolytes and vitamins you pee out while drinking makes you feel a lot less like a light-sensitive slug the next day.

settings.title: Coffee Drinkers
settings.text: Coffee is a mild diuretic, which is another way of saying you’ll lose more fluids than you’re taking in. Since you lose electrolytes while sleeping, starting the day off with a cup of dehydrating Joe makes running into that midday wall nearly inevitable. Start your day off better than waking up on the right side of the bed with a half-second squeeze in your coffee to replenish those Energy Bunny electrolytes.

settings.suptext: of American's sodium intake is from processed salt
settings.text:
Nutrient sparse sources found in table salt and processed foods (like sodium bicarbonate and sodium chloride) are used by electrolyte supplements because they're cheap.

These sodium sources are essentially baking soda and road salt and lack the nutritional density and bioavailable structure for effecient hydration

Buoy's harvested sea salt is preserved in its naturally-occurring ionic state from protected marine areas in the South of France that's loaded with trace minerals for fast-acting cellular hydration.

Modern agricultural practices and commercial water have depleted our soil and natural water sources of essential minerals, making them hard to find even in the healthiest diets.

Even minor deficiencies or imbalances can negatively impact our ability to absorb nutrients.

Squeeze them back into your diet with Buoy's 87 ionic trace minerals preserved in their naturally-occurring ionic states for high bioavailability and fast-absorption.

settings.title: A better way to hydrate
settings.subtext: Add a fast-acting electrolyte and mineral replenishment to all your favorite drinks.
